description:
Free and open source structure-from-motion program

Regard3D is a structure-from-motion program. It can create 3D models from objects using a series of photographs taken of this object from different viewpoints.
Changelog:  
- Upgraded to OpenMVG 1.4
- Upgraded to OpenCV 4.0
- Added new Incremental pipeline of OpenMVG
- GPS information can be used now
